content.help: Choose if the abilities also appear as spells or not.

You increase your maximum energy level by 100. Gettting above 100 does not strengthen most abilities.

SkillSuccubusBaseLevel >= 50.0

You increase your maximum energy level by 600 more. Gettting above 100 does not strengthen most abilities. (1000 max)

You can no longer regenerate health. Below 0 Energy you can no longer regenerate stamina and magicka. At -100 Energy you enter a feeding frenzy, which increases damage taken by an insane amount and you force yourself onto the first person you can drain.

You can regenerate health again at 50 or more energy.
